home.heroSubtitle: Classic and contemporary haircuts & grooming in a modern setting. Walk-ins welcome.
home.heroTagline: From hot towel shaves to straight razor shaves — we offer classic grooming with a skilled touch.
home.experienceBody: The experience is more than just a haircut. Our skilled barbers and dedication to the craft make every visit a gentleman's experience.
home.pullQuote: Every visit is an experience — not just a cut.
home.visitUsSubtitle: Stop by or book ahead. We're here for you.
home.testimonial1: Best fade in town. Always leave looking sharp.
home.testimonial2: Friendly, fast, and fair prices. My go-to spot.
home.testimonial3: They know how to handle my beard. Highly recommend.
home.featuredTestimonial: I've been coming here for years. The attention to detail and the atmosphere keep me coming back.
home.whyChooseUsSubtitle: We're more than a quick stop for a cut.
home.whyChooseUs1Body: Every barber on our team is trained in classic and modern cuts. We take the time to get it right.
home.whyChooseUs2Body: Our shop is spotless and welcoming. Relax while we take care of you.
home.whyChooseUs3Body: Quality grooming shouldn't break the bank. We keep our prices honest and transparent.
home.whyChooseUs4Body: No appointment? No problem. Walk in when it works for you — we'll fit you in when we can.
home.whatToExpect1Body: Come in and say hi. We'll add you to the list or confirm your appointment.
home.whatToExpect2Body: Tell us what you want. We'll recommend a cut or style that fits your look and lifestyle.
home.whatToExpect3Body: Sit back while we work. You'll leave looking sharp and feeling great.
home.faq1A: Appointments are recommended for faster service, but we welcome walk-ins. Wait times vary by day and time.
home.faq2Q: What payment methods do you accept?
home.faq2A: We accept cash, and all major credit and debit cards.
home.faq3Q: How long does a typical haircut take?
home.faq3A: A standard men's haircut is about 30 minutes. Beard work and full grooming can take 45 minutes or more.
home.faq4Q: Do you offer services for kids?
home.faq4A: Yes. We offer kids' cuts for ages 12 and under. We're patient and make it fun.
home.faq5Q: What if I need to cancel or reschedule?
home.faq5A: Please give us at least a few hours notice so we can offer your slot to someone else.
home.fromTheShopSubtitle: Tips and updates from our barbers.
home.fromTheShop1Title: How often should you get a haircut?
home.fromTheShop1Excerpt: It depends on your style and how fast your hair grows. For most guys, every 4–6 weeks keeps things sharp.
home.fromTheShop2Excerpt: A little oil and regular trimming at home can extend the life of your beard shape. We'll show you how.
home.fromTheShop3Title: What to ask for when you don't know the name
home.fromTheShop3Excerpt: Bring a photo or describe the length and look you want. We'll translate it into a cut that works for you.

services.whatToExpectIntro: Every service starts with a quick consultation. We'll confirm the look you want, then get to work. Most visits run 15–45 minutes depending on the service.
services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: From quick trims to full shaves, we offer the services you need.

hair-and-beard.description: Haircut and beard trim together. Our most popular package.

kids-cut.description: A patient, fun experience for the little ones. Ages 12 and under.

senior-cut.name: Senior Cut
senior-cut.description: Gentle, respectful service. We offer senior-friendly pricing.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A little about our shop and what we stand for.
about.story: We opened our doors to give the neighborhood a place where quality cuts and friendly service come first. No frills — just skilled barbers who take pride in their work and treat every customer like family.
about.value1: Every cut gets the same attention. We don't rush.
about.value2: We're your neighbors. We remember your name and your style.
about.value3: Great service doesn't have to break the bank.
about.ourSpaceSubtitle: Where we do what we love.
about.policiesIntro: A few things to know before your visit.
about.policiesCancellationBody: Please cancel or reschedule at least a few hours in advance so we can offer your slot to another client.
about.policiesLateBody: If you're running late, give us a call. We'll do our best to accommodate you; we may need to shorten your service or reschedule.
about.policiesKidsBody: Kids are welcome. We ask that they're supervised and respectful of other clients.
